channel.title: Mashed Potatoes on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Easy Gravy Recipe
item.description: Easy Gravy Recipe Quick Gravy Recipes, Easily Made with Rouxand Either Chicken, Beef, Seafood, or Pork Base. Great for Mashed Potatoesand Sauces for Casserolesor Stew. Gravy Recipe Ingredients This is a variable for beef, chicken or pork gravy. 1 tbsp Beef, chicken, seafood, or pork base / boullion (usually 1 tsp per cup of water) 3 c water 1/2 c roux Directions Boil water with base. Thicken slowly with roux to desired thickness using wire whisk.
